segments.text: Just next to the boy, there's a young girl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing on the floor, looking up at him and the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly anticipating a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the precarious stool, which is a small relief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so attentive, she's definitely part of this operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine she's waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet to see their teamwork, even if it's mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of children planning a secret cookie raid is quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both completely engrossed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
